Content.Text:
<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Good morning, <MYNAME>! Mornings make me
sleepy. I can't stop yawning.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good morning, <MYNAME>! I managed to
wake up early today, but then I fell
back asleep and ended up sleeping in!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Good morning, <MYNAME>! I'm going to
work super hard today. You should too!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hello <MYNAME>. How's work on the farm
going? You should let me help you out
sometime.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey there <MYNAME>. If you've got any
problems, don't hesitate to ask me for
help.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey there <MYNAME>. I get sleepy later
in the day. It's like the air feels
heavy or something.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Congratulations on another day of hard
work, <MYNAME>. It's good to stretch
before bed. You'll sleep better!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good evening, <MYNAME>. I'm making plans
for tomorrow. I've so much to do but I
don't know where to start.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Good evening, <MYNAME>. Today was very
fun. I hope tomorrow's another fun day
too!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, g'morning, <MYNAME>. Um, good luck
today. See you later!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Hey, G'morning! I wanted to tell you, I
saw you in my dreams last night.
<PAGE>
Huh? What kind of dream? That's—that's a
secret! But I can tell you that it was a
very good dream!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
G'morning, <MYNAME>. I'm a lucky guy to
get to see you so early in the day.
Today's gonna be a good day!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Um, do you need something? If not, then
I've got to go now.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Hey <MYNAME>! I was just thinking about
you! What? What was I thinking?
<PAGE>
Do I really need to tell you? I was
thinking that I want to see you and...
Argh! Don't ask. It's embarrassing!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Hey <MYNAME>. Seeing you really lifts my
spirits. Nothing beats having a
girlfriend!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Um, do you need something? If not, then
you should probably head home, shouldn't
you?

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey <MYNAME>. If you're free, let's talk
a bit. It's too early to say goodnight.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good evening, <MYNAME>. I'm glad to see
that you're looking healthy and happy.
<PAGE>
We didn't run into each other at all
today, so I was a little worried about
you. I guess I just worry too much.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
G'morning, <MYNAME>. You know, you were
snoring last night. You must be tired.
Don't work too hard okay?

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
G'morning, <MYNAME>. Did you sleep well
last night? It's a brand new day. Let's
give it our all!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Huh? Do you need something from me?

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I can't believe you, <MYNAME>. I mean,
we slept in the same bed, but you
haven't said a thing to me all morning.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>But I'm not mad or anything. I was just
a little lonely, so I was just sulking a
bit. Don't make me worry, okay?

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Congratulations on another day of hard
work, <MYNAME>. Have you eaten?
<PAGE>
You've got to eat properly to stay
healthy.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Huh? Do you want something from me?

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good evening, <MYNAME>. Hey, do you
think you'll be coming home late again?
<PAGE>
I hate going to sleep alone. I mean, we
live together. It'd be nice if we could
go to sleep at the same time tonight!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Hey, <MYNAME>. Let me know if you're
tired, okay? I may not be much of a
masseur, but I'll do my best.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Hey, <MYNAME>. Would you just look
at this awesome weather! It's a perfect
day to just lay out in the sun.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Quite rainy today, eh <MYNAME>? Sunny
days are nice, but I like the rain too.
They both have their good points.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's hot today. If you're gonna be
outside for a long time, be careful not
to get sunstroke. Drink plenty of water!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
It's so nice and cool. Summer rain is
truly a blessing! Today looks to be a
comfortable day.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I love sunny fall days! They make me
want to go play sports and work up a
sweat.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Look at this rain. It's too bad, because
I wanted to go outside today and get
some exercise.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's very cold today isn't it, <MYNAME>?
When I sit still, I feel like my body is
going to freeze.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
It's snowing today! It makes me want to
go out and have a snowball fight. Come
on <MYNAME>, let's go!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Typhoons can really frighten animals. Is
your farm okay, <MYNAME>?

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Big snowstorms can really frighten
animals. Is your farm okay, <MYNAME>?

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
There's a typhoon today, <MYNAME>. If
you're going to go outside, be careful.
And come home early okay?

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
There's a big snowstorm today, <MYNAME>.
If you're going to go outside, be
careful. And come home early okay?

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Hey! <MYNAME>! I heard you're in a
relationship! Congratulations!
<PAGE>
You look very happy! I wish I had a
girlfriend. I'm sure you two will be
happy together!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT>
The big tree in this forest is amazing,
isn't it? I want to climb it, but the
townspeople would probably get mad.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT>
It's fun collecting all the different
plants and insects in this forest, but
it can be scary at night.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT>
This river is great because it has so
many different types of fish. They taste
best when you cook them on the spot.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT>
River breezes are nice right? I like to
jog around here. It's fun to run where
you can enjoy the seasonal changes.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT>
There are a lot of wild animals, so I
come here often. They're so cute!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT>
The view from here is awesome isn't it?
It'd be a great place to have a picnic.
We should all try it sometime!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT>
Isn't there just something about
terraced fields that feels familiar?
<PAGE>
It's not like I have them in my hometown
or anything, but there's something about
them that moves me. It's almost magical.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT>
Wow, this is a really big farm. I bet
the pets I take care of would be very
happy if I brought them here.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT>
You know, going into a mine at night
would be super-scary wouldn't it? I
mean, everything echoes.
<PAGE>
I'm sure I would have cried like a baby
in here when I was little.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT>
There's something kind of romantic about
digging up minerals and waking them from
their long slumber in the earth.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
This town still feels pretty lonely
doesn't it? I hope more people come.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I feel like this town has gotten a bit
livelier recently. I'm not just
imagining things am I?
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>It seems like more people come to the
store. And I meet more people on the
street. It's great!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I feel like this town is getting
livelier and livelier.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>At this rate, I'll be able to find
plenty of good owners for my pets.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
It's really great that the town has
recovered like this. I am in love with
this bustling town!
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>We've all got to work together to make
sure that this town stays as lively as
it is now!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Do you like animals, <MYNAME>? I have
dogs, cats, and horses at my pet store.
Come take a look sometime!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's fun to get out and move isn't it?
Do you like sports, <MYNAME>? If you
do, we should play together sometime!
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>I like all sports, but I especially like
surfing. I also recommend scuba diving!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Handling animals can be stressful right?
It's tough, and you can't slack off. But
it's rewarding and it's fun!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Neil can be rude, but deep down, I know
he's a good guy.
<PAGE>
We both handle animals, so I want to be
friends, but I don't think it'll be
easy. I guess I'll just do what I can!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's always more fun to have a positive
attitude than a negative one.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
People who've known me for awhile tell
me that I haven't changed a bit.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>How can they say that? I'm not a cry
baby anymore, I'm smarter, and I'm
better at dealing with animals.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
You're a very good person, <MYNAME>!
I'm really glad that we're friends!
<PAGE>
If there's ever anything I can do for
you, just let me know okay? I'll do
whatever I can to lend a hand!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
I'm sorry, <MYNAME>, but I don't really
want to talk to you.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Have I done something to offend you? If
you're mad about something, tell me. I
can't stand having you mad at me.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
I'm overjoyed about being your
boyfriend, <MYNAME>. I'm going to take
very good care of you.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I've been telling a lot of people that
we're going out, and everyone's very
happy for us!
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>What? Is it too much? I just can't help
it. I want to brag to everyone that I
managed to become your boyfriend.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Ever since we started going out, every
day has been so much fun. It feels like
everything is really going my way.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
What do I like about you? There's so
much that I don't even know where to
start!
<PAGE>
Okay, let's see...The thing that I like
most about you is...umm, well...This is
too embarrassing! I'm sorry!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
You're so wonderful. I'm happy just
being near you, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>Thank you, <MYNAME>. I love you more than
anyone else in the world.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Oh, there you are, <MYNAME>. You've been
harder to notice recently. I can never
seem to tell when you're around.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Is it just me? I feel like I was happier
before we were married. I wonder why...

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Do I look like a husband to you? Do you
think I'm a good match for you? ...It's
nothing. Don't worry about it.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>, I was wondering...You think I'm
more dependable now than before we were
married right?
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>What? Not at all?! I'll work harder
then! Just wait, you'll see.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
We both work, so at home, we should each
handle the chores that we're good at.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>We can work together on the tough stuff.
That's what marriage is all about. When
I'm with you, everything is fun!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
My day starts with your smiling face,
and it ends with your cute sleeping
face. That means every day is fantastic!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I love you, <MYNAME>, and I'll love you
tomorrow, next year, in ten years, and
forever after that.
<PAGE>
<MYNAME>, may I hold you tightly?
...Just kidding. Maybe later.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Being boyfriend and girlfriend can be
nerve-wracking can't it? I'm so nervous,
and I don't know what to say.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Look, I'm fine now. It's okay that we
broke up. Let's keep being friends,
okay?

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Honestly, things were very rough after
we broke up, and I was full of regret.
I'm glad we're back together again.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Thank you for choosing me, <MYNAME>.
I'm the happiest guy in the world.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
You looked absolutely beautiful in
your wedding dress. I fell in love with
you all over again.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I'm looking forward to having kids!
It might be tough for you, but I'll be
there for you. Together we can do it!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You're carrying a baby now, so don't
overdo it with work okay? And be careful
to watch your step so you don't fall.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm going to be a father soon, aren't I?
<MYNAME>, I'm sure the three of us will
make for a happy family.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I hope <CHILD_NAME> grows up to be
healthy. That's the only thing I want.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<CHILD_NAME> has definitely grown a lot.
I wonder when <CHILD_NAME> will start
walking? I can't wait to play together.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
I've been talking to <CHILD_NAME> so
much recently that I've started talking
like a baby. I've got to be careful.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's really interesting how now that
<CHILD_NAME> is bigger it's like we're
friends.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh, wow! Lasagna! My favorite! Thank
you!
<PAGE>
I don't understand how lasagna can be
so delicious. I can't help but smile
when I'm eating it.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Yay! <ITEMNAME0>!
I love it, <MYNAME>! Thank you so much!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Thanks, <MYNAME>. This is an awesome
present. I'm touched!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Thanks, <MYNAME>. But of all things, you
got me a cream puff... I guess I'll just
have to do my best to eat it.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Amazing! I can't believe they can grow
this big! You're an excellent farmer,
<MYNAME>!
<PAGE>
I almost just want to use this as a
decoration for my room. Thanks, <MYNAME>!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
A present for me? I appreciate the
sentiment, but I'd feel guilty taking
it.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
No, that's okay, <MYNAME>. I'd feel bad
taking it. Why don't you use it?

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
No, that's okay, <MYNAME>. I'd feel bad
taking it. Why don't you use it?

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Slow down there, <MYNAME>. You just gave
me a present.  Maybe you can save that
one for later?

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well, I already got something today.
How about you give it to me tomorrow?
I'm looking forward to it!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I couldn't accept this much all in one
day. Maybe you can let me look forward
to getting this present tomorrow.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Whoa! Lasagna! This is the ultimate
birthday present! Thank you, <MYNAME>!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<ITEMNAME0>!
And on my birthday! I'm so happy! Thank
you, <MYNAME>!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<ITEMNAME0>!
How lucky I am to get this on my
birthday! Thank you <MYNAME>!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
A birthday present for me?! Thank you,
<MYNAME>!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
<ITEMNAME0>? 
This is kind of a depressing thing to 
get for my birthday...
<PAGE>
But hey, it's a birthday present, and
it's the thought that counts. Thanks,
<MYNAME>!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
<ITEMNAME0>?
I feel pretty unlucky getting this on
my birthday.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>But hey, it's a birthday present, and
it's the thought that counts. Thanks,
<MYNAME>!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Oh, a cream puff. Not really what I was
hoping to receive for my birthday...
<PAGE>
But hey, it's a birthday present. I'll
do my best to eat it. Thank you, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<ITEMNAME0>! 
Wow, I feel like I won the lottery with
this birthday present!
<PAGE>
Thanks, <MYNAME>!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<ITEMNAME0>!
I'm a lucky guy to get a birthday
present this big!
<PAGE>
Thanks, <MYNAME>!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Little chicks are so cute aren't they? I
could watch them wobble around all day.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
What a cute hen! Now hen, I want you to
lay some delicious eggs for <MYNAME>.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Wow, this big hen is really cool. I'm
impressed that you were able to raise
her to grow so big, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Come here you! Are you being a good dog?
I want you to do what <MYNAME> tells
you to, alright?

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This dog's a bit chubby, but in a cute
way.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This dog looks calm and wise. Good dog.
You take care of, <MYNAME>!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This dog's a bit chubby. But a big dog
can be pretty imposing. I probably would
have cried if I were still little.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
It's so cute how cats do their own
thing. I can't resist trying to tease
them..

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This cat is a bit fat. Its chubby belly
feels so soft.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
What nice fur. It's fluffy and soft. I
almost want to use this cat as a pillow.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
This cat's a bit fat. But it's cute when
it tries to act so brazen.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, that's right, today is the Flower
Festival! I completely forgot! How
considerate of you, <MYNAME>. Thanks!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh! That's right! Today is the Flower
Festival, isn't it? I really appreciate
this. Thanks!
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>I should have prepared a flower, too. I
would have loved to see your cute face
light up from getting a nice flower.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh, that's right, today is the Flower
Festival isn't it? Thanks <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>You went through all the trouble of
getting this for me. In return, how
about I give you a kiss?
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>What? No?! Aww. I was really looking
forward to it. That's too bad.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Whoa! Is this a Harmony Day present for
me?!
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>It looks very delicious! Thanks, I'm
going to enjoy it!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Getting Harmony Day chocolate from your
girlfriend is special. I've been looking
forward to this for about a month.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>Thank you so much <MYNAME>. I really
appreciate this! I'm going to cherish
each bite.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Thank goodness! I was worried about what
I would do if I didn't get Harmony Day
chocolates from you this year!
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>Thank you, <MYNAME>. I'm so happy that I
want to brag about it to the whole
world!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What's this? Pumpkin Festival candy?
Wow, I didn't think that at this age
people would still treat me like a kid.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>But it looks tasty, so I'll take it.
Thank you!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
What's this? Pumpkin Festival candy? I
didn't expect my girlfriend to treat me
like a child. Am I that immature?
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>But how can I turn down sweets from you?
I'll enjoy every bite. Thanks, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
This couldn't possible be Pumpkin
Festival candy could it? How could you
treat your husband like this <MYNAME>?
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>But this candy is from you, and it would
be a shame to let it go to waste, so
I'll eat it. Thanks <MYNAME>!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Are you going to propose to someone!?
Good luck, <MYNAME>! I'm rooting for
you!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Whoa! I appreciate the sentiment but...
This is too soon for me.
<PAGE>
Um, I need to think about this more. Can
you give me a little more time? Please
wait just a little bit more.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Is this, is this for me?!
<PAGE>
Okay, <MYNAME>. I'm ready for this!
Let's go somewhere where we can talk
about this some more.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
That's right. We're going to be husband
and wife soon. It's so exciting!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I'll never forget that smile you had
when you proposed to me. Thank you,
<MYNAME>.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
<MYNAME>! Trying to give the blue
feather to someone else?! Do you want to
break up with me?!
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>If it was just a joke, please don't ever
do something like that again. Next time
I'll really be angry.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Are you going to confess your love to
someone?! Good luck <MYNAME>!
I'm rooting for you!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
What?! Is this for me? This isn't a joke
right?
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>Okay, <MYNAME>. I have some things I
want to tell you too. Let's go someplace
quiet where we can talk.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Do you remember when you confessed your
love to me? You had this embarrassed
expression on your face. It was so cute.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Are you confessing your love to me?
Thank you, <MYNAME>. I love you too.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
<MYNAME>! Trying to give a ring to
someone else! Do you want to break up
with me?!
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>If it was just a joke, I don't want you
to ever do something like that again.
Next time I'll really be angry.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
So cute! Just look at those yearning,
eyes. It would be so nice to have one
for a pet.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
So cute! Wild animals can be tamer than
I thought. I want to try taking care of
a wild animal like this.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Turtles are so cute when they walk. They
look so uncertain. It makes me want to
take care of them.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Happy birthday, <MYNAME>! Here's a
present! I hope it comes in handy!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
It's your birthday today right, <MYNAME>?
Congratulations! You should have a party
